body: It picks the `impl<T:Numeric+Display> ToSql for T` impl.

Even worse because it's telling me that

``` rust
<anon>:37:1: 37:43 note: required by `WhereType`
```

So it picks `impl<T: Numeric + Display> ToSql for T` for `Subquery` even though it's neither `Numeric` nor `Display`.

Current output:
```
error[E0309]: the parameter type `T` may not live long enough
  --> src/main.rs:33:38
   |
33 | impl<'a, T: Numeric + ToSQL + Clone> WhereType<'a> for T {}
   |          --                          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |          |
   |          help: consider adding an explicit lifetime bound `T: 'a`...
   |
note: ...so that the type `T` will meet its required lifetime bounds
  --> src/main.rs:33:38
   |
33 | impl<'a, T: Numeric + ToSQL + Clone> WhereType<'a> for T {}
   |                                      ^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0277]: the trait bound `&'a Subquery<'a>: Numeric` is not satisfied
  --> src/main.rs:37:10
   |
37 | impl<'a> WhereType<'a> for &'a Subquery<'a> {}
   |          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ the trait `Numeric` is not implemented for `&'a Subquery<'a>`
   |
   = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `ToSQL` for `&'a Subquery<'a>`

error[E0277]: `Subquery<'a>` doesn't implement `std::fmt::Display`
  --> src/main.rs:37:10
   |
37 | impl<'a> WhereType<'a> for &'a Subquery<'a> {}
   |          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ `Subquery<'a>` cannot be formatted with the default formatter
   |
   = help: the trait `std::fmt::Display` is not implemented for `Subquery<'a>`
   = note: in format strings you may be able to use `{:?}` (or {:#?} for pretty-print) instead
   = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `std::fmt::Display` for `&'a Subquery<'a>`
   = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `ToSQL` for `&'a Subquery<'a>`
```

Update: the [current output](https://play.rust-lang.org/?gist=8295fe2b1cf5225ae082&version=nightly) points you in the right direction, but doesn't outright tell you to impl `ToSql` for `&Subquery`:

```
error[E0309]: the parameter type `T` may not live long enough
  --> src/main.rs:33:38
   |
33 | impl<'a, T: Numeric + ToSQL + Clone> WhereType<'a> for T {}
   |          --                          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |          |
   |          help: consider adding an explicit lifetime bound...: `T: 'a +`
   |
note: ...so that the type `T` will meet its required lifetime bounds
  --> src/main.rs:33:38
   |
33 | impl<'a, T: Numeric + ToSQL + Clone> WhereType<'a> for T {}
   |                                      ^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0277]: the trait bound `&'a Subquery<'a>: Numeric` is not satisfied
  --> src/main.rs:37:10
   |
31 | pub trait WhereType<'a>: ToSQL + CloneToTrait<'a> {}
   |                          ----- required by this bound in `WhereType`
...
37 | impl<'a> WhereType<'a> for &'a Subquery<'a> {}
   |          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ the trait `Numeric` is not implemented for `&'a Subquery<'a>`
   |
   = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `ToSQL` for `&'a Subquery<'a>`

error[E0277]: `Subquery<'a>` doesn't implement `std::fmt::Display`
  --> src/main.rs:37:10
   |
31 | pub trait WhereType<'a>: ToSQL + CloneToTrait<'a> {}
   |                          ----- required by this bound in `WhereType`
...
37 | impl<'a> WhereType<'a> for &'a Subquery<'a> {}
   |          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ `Subquery<'a>` cannot be formatted with the default formatter
   |
   = help: the trait `std::fmt::Display` is not implemented for `Subquery<'a>`
   = note: in format strings you may be able to use `{:?}` (or {:#?} for pretty-print) instead
   = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `std::fmt::Display` for `&'a Subquery<'a>`
   = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `ToSQL` for `&'a Subquery<'a>`
```

Current output:

```
error[E0277]: the trait bound `&'a Subquery<'a>: Numeric` is not satisfied
  --> src/main.rs:37:28
   |
37 | impl<'a> WhereType<'a> for &'a Subquery<'a> {}
   |                            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ the trait `Numeric` is not implemented for `&'a Subquery<'a>`
   |
   = help: the following other types implement trait `Numeric`:
             i8
             i16
             i32
             i64
             u8
             u16
             u32
             u64
           and 2 others
note: required for `&'a Subquery<'a>` to implement `ToSQL`
  --> src/main.rs:25:28
   |
25 | impl<T: Numeric + Display> ToSQL for T {
   |         -------            ^^^^^     ^
   |         |
   |         unsatisfied trait bound introduced here
note: required by a bound in `WhereType`
  --> src/main.rs:31:26
   |
31 | pub trait WhereType<'a>: ToSQL + CloneToTrait<'a> {}
   |                          ^^^^^ required by this bound in `WhereType`

error[E0277]: `Subquery<'a>` doesn't implement `std::fmt::Display`
  --> src/main.rs:37:28
   |
37 | impl<'a> WhereType<'a> for &'a Subquery<'a> {}
   |                            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ `Subquery<'a>` cannot be formatted with the default formatter
   |
   = help: the trait `std::fmt::Display` is not implemented for `Subquery<'a>`
   = note: in format strings you may be able to use `{:?}` (or {:#?} for pretty-print) instead
   = help: the following other types implement trait `ToSQL`:
             Where<'a>
             &'a str
   = note: required for `&'a Subquery<'a>` to implement `std::fmt::Display`
note: required for `&'a Subquery<'a>` to implement `ToSQL`
  --> src/main.rs:25:28
   |
25 | impl<T: Numeric + Display> ToSQL for T {
   |                   -------  ^^^^^     ^
   |                   |
   |                   unsatisfied trait bound introduced here
note: required by a bound in `WhereType`
  --> src/main.rs:31:26
   |
31 | pub trait WhereType<'a>: ToSQL + CloneToTrait<'a> {}
   |                          ^^^^^ required by this bound in `WhereType`
```
